description:
An add-on for ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN. 
This set contains the following:

Playable Aircraft: MiG-35D Super Fulcrum
A multirole jet fighter developed as a variant of the MiG-29.
In addition to an expanded wing area, the craft boasts reinforced parts and has been retrofitted with a new thrust vectoring turbo engine, giving it greater maneuverability and offensive capabilities compared to the original model.
This set also includes 7 skins, including the special Tiger Skin.

This aircraft can equip the SAAM, 6AAM, or 4AGM as its special weapon.
name: ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - MiG-35D Super Fulcrum Set
